long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EasyTabs lets you open multiple links at once with a single click. Organize your links into categories like social media, entertainment, and homework, and launch them all instantly without having to open each one manually. Simplify your browsing with EasyTabs.
